text: access your free language gifts right
now before they expire here's what
you're getting this month first the
using opposites conversation cheat sheet
with this new cheat sheet you'll learn

far hot and cold and grammar rules on
how to use these words in a sentence
second the how to say goodbye pdf

third can you talk about cars in your

fourth
must know words and phrases for public

sixth want the language learning app
